subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paul Casey shot a six-under-par 66 and Peter Hanson had a 67 to share a one-stroke lead after the third round of the Volvo Champions in Riffa, Bahrain.
snippet: Paul Casey shot a six-under-par 66 and Peter Hanson had a 67 to share a one-stroke lead after the third round of the Volvo Champions in Riffa, Bahrain.
